title: Personalized Mathematics Leadership Enhancement Through Intelligent Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic secondary-level mathematics concepts and corporate leadership experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a VR simulation environment using digital devices, with personalized design considering learners' knowledge levels and leadership competencies

learning_goals: Learners' individual math knowledge gaps are analyzed to generate personalized learning paths with 90% accuracy.
Learning effectiveness is improved by 25% or more through simulation-based assessments.
Perform iterative content optimization three or more times using a multi-agent system
Develop five or more math-based decision-making scenarios applicable to real corporate environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
